title: New: EVAN – Blowing Smoke
content:
Damn.

Music doesn’t get any more raw than this track from London artist EVAN, yet by the same merit, it’s vulnerability and underproduced vibe is partially why it’s so moving. Entirely acoustic, Blowing Smoke harks back to early Conor Oberst lyrically, and even tinges of Nick Drake amongst the honest poetry. ‘if my dad could only see, how lonesome I could be, he’d say “it’s not the loneliness that kills, it’s the never ever really living free“‘ may well be the most heartwarming, emotive line of 2012 thus far.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
